description: This file defines interfaces related to remote connections within the WPEFramework RPC namespace. It includes the IRemoteConnection interface with nested INotification, providing methods for connection lifecycle management, such as activation, deactivation, termination, and launching remote connections. It also defines iterator type aliases for string and uint32_t collections.

classes.name: IRemoteConnection
classes.description: Interface for managing remote connections, supporting operations like acquiring IDs, termination, and launching connections. It includes a nested notification interface for connection state events.

classes.name: IRemoteConnection::INotification
classes.description: Nested interface for receiving notifications about remote connection events such as activation, deactivation, and termination.

methods.name: IRemoteConnection::Id
methods.description: Returns the unique identifier of the remote connection.

methods.name: IRemoteConnection::RemoteId
methods.description: Returns the remote identifier associated with the connection.

methods.name: IRemoteConnection::Acquire
methods.description: Acquires a specific interface on the remote connection given interface ID and version.

methods.name: IRemoteConnection::Launch
methods.description: Launches the remote connection, returning a status code.

methods.name: IRemoteConnection::PostMortem
methods.description: Performs diagnostics or post-mortem analysis of the connection.

methods.name: IRemoteConnection::INotification::Activated
methods.description: Called when a remote connection is activated.

methods.name: IRemoteConnection::INotification::Deactivated
methods.description: Called when a remote connection is deactivated.

methods.name: IRemoteConnection::INotification::Terminated
methods.description: Called when a remote connection is terminated.

methods.name: REQUESTEDINTERFACE * Acquire(const uint32_t waitTime,const string & className,const uint32_t version)

ctags.name: Acquire
ctags.pattern: /^            REQUESTEDINTERFACE* Acquire(const uint32_t waitTime, const string& className, const /
ctags.signature: (const uint32_t waitTime,const string & className,const uint32_t version)

ctags.name: INotification
ctags.pattern: /^            struct EXTERNAL INotification : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/

ctags.name: IRemoteConnection
ctags.pattern: /^        struct EXTERNAL IRemoteConnection : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
